inclusion.criterion: Decrease in active cervical range of motion
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Cervical Range of Motion inclinometer (i.e., the CROM)

inclusion.criterion: Headache symptoms change based on manual pressure to cervical spine, posture, or neck movement
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Tested by Mary Free Bed physical therapist during evaluation

inclusion.criterion: Cognition adequate for understanding (alert and oriented x3)
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Tested by Mary Free Bed physical therapists

inclusion.criterion: English-speaking, or able to understand English well enough to follow directions
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Cervical spine fusion less than 6 months
exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: Medical documentation and history portion of initial evaluation

exclusion.criterion: Trauma to neck or head within the past 3 months
exclusion.label: unknown
